Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: It's the best I love it

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: We have done 13 escape rooms. The bank heist was too small for ten people. Didn't really enjoy!

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: We had a blast! All though we recommend booking ahead. There are some games in the waiting room while you wait. We ended up going to grab dinner and walk around waiting for our time. We escaped the Bank room. We plan on going back for the other rooms in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: This was our first time doing an escape room, it was super fun and challenging! We did the Bank Heist with 6 adults. Here came the screaming of numbers and aggravating clues! We all had a great time, and made it out with 8 mins to spare, can't wait to do another one.

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: We got to the last clue and the safe wouldn't open for us. Appears others have had the same problem. Our host was able to make it work and we still shot the sheriff. A little disappointment at the end but we had such a great time with the group and clues that it didn't ruin our evening.

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Took my wife and 3 kids to play the Western Bank Heist. This was amazing. The trick to this is to relax, have fun, and pay attention. The room was not too challenging but we all had to be paying attention, all the clues were there. This was a blast. It was very satisfying. We will be doing this again.
